channel.title: Players can walk through walls?(317)
channel.description: When players on my server attack an npc from behind a wall, or follow another player from behind a wall, or attack another player from behind a wall, they walk right through it. Players have been escaping from jail doing this. HOW CAN I FIX IT?

item.title: Players can walk through walls?(317)
item.dc:creator: @life_lover7 life lover7
item.description:
@life_lover7 wrote:

When players on my server attack an npc from behind a wall, or follow another player from behind a wall, or attack another player from behind a wall, they walk right through it. Players have been escaping from jail doing this. HOW CAN I FIX IT?

Read full topic
